issues.description: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, the symbol fix_vec_sub_asm is declared with `extern` instead of `global`, conflicting with the template which exports the function with `global`. This mismatch in symbol visibility can lead to linking errors or confusion about where the function is defined.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, replace `extern fix_vec_sub_asm` with `global fix_vec_sub_asm` (in the section .data) to match the template declaration and ensure the symbol is exported correctly.
